name: Ferroglobe PLC
description: Ferroglobe PLC is a leading global producer of silicon and silicon-based products, with a strong commitment to sustainability and innovation in the materials industry. Established through the merger of Ferro Alloys and Globe Specialty Metals, the company focuses on the production of silicon metal, silicon-based alloys, and other specialty materials used in a wide array of applications, including renewable energy, electric vehicles, and construction. Ferroglobe operates several manufacturing facilities across North America and Europe, ensuring a robust supply chain and high-quality products tailored to meet the diverse needs of its customers. The company is dedicated to reducing its environmental impact and enhancing energy efficiency in its operations, aligning with global trends toward greener technologies. Ferroglobe's mission is to be a reliable partner in the global transition to sustainable industries while delivering value and innovation to its stakeholders.
